page.title: 04COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The Community Centre used to be the house for the headmaster or the headmistress.In 1976 it was converted into a Community Centre.The village clubs meet there once a month in the evenings:-- Monday--Gardening, Tuesday--Women's Institute and Senior Citezens, Wednesday--Young Farmers' Club Sunday--Young Farmers'Club-drama, Every Tuesday afternoon a Play Group meets for children who are pre-school age.There are also whist drives and coffee evenings held in it.For special village events the partition between the school and Community Centre is opened, so everyone can fit in - this is when the New Year party,harvest supper and senior citzens' Christmas dinner are held.
